myPath.path: On the path to becoming a senior web developer.
myPath.road: As the saying goes, the road by walking..

text.1: I have successfully graduated from the 'IT STEP' Computer Academy with a focus on Front-end development.
text.2: Throughout my studies, I gained expertise in HTML, CSS, JS, and explored frameworks/libraries such as Node (back-end), Vue, React, and Angular.
text.3: I came to the IT field not by chance, having worked as a lawyer in a large IT company, surrounding myself with developer friends, closely interacting with programmers when developing contracts with business partners, reading and viewing relevant information, I entered the IT STEP Academy with great desire.
text.4: During my learning journey, I took the initiative to independently seek information and solve complex problems. While I have made significant progress, I recognize the value of having an experienced mentor to accelerate my path towards becoming a senior web developer.
text.5: I am committed to continuous learning and growth in the ever-evolving field of web development.

experience.name: Institute of World Economics and Politics
